snippet.title: Arcade Longplay [298] Crime Fighters
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: SCHLAUCHI

A pretty repetitive BeatEmUp by Konami. At the end you fight all the bosses at once - if you beat them the game just starts over, so i let myself get killed. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
